page.title: 12ASLACKBY-POP. & LANDSCAPE
page.content: {POPULATION } The population is approximately 215. 35 are aged between 0 & 14 years 51 are aged between 14 & 34 years 79 are aged between 34 & 65 years 50 are aged over 65 years. {LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS Aslackby lies on either side of the river Ave.One road follows the North bank of the river,while the second branches out from a ford in the river and cuts through a hill on the South bank. The ford has a bridge beside it.Cars and small vans use the bridge,while heavy lorries and tractors go through the shallow water. The Ave flooded in 1976 and many houses and gardens were completely saturated. Aslackby once had a 12th century castle of the Knights Templers. The tower collapsed in 1892 and Temple
